mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select o.orderno, to_char(o.orderdate, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI')as orderdate, o.userid, o.arr, o.arrtel, o.arrzipcode, o.arraddr, o.arrdetailaddr, o.request, o.pluspoint, o.usecoupon, o.deliveryprice, o.totalprice, o.status, s.pname from ordertbl o join (select orderno, listagg(pname,',') within group (order by pname) as pname from suborder group by orderno) s on o.orderno=s.orderno where o.userid = #{userid} order by rownum desc) where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{onePageNum} order by rownum asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord}#{onePageRecord} order by rownum desc

select o.orderno, to_char(o.orderdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as orderdate, o.arr, o.arrtel, o.arraddr, o.arrdetailaddr, o.request, o.status, o.usepoint, o.couponprice, o.usecoupon, o.totalprice, s.suborderno, s.orderno, s.pno, s.optno, s.quantity, s.subprice, s.pname from suborder s join ordertbl o on s.orderno = o.orderno where s.orderno=#{param1}
select count(rownum) as totalRecord from ordertbl where userid = #{userid}
select sum(point) as point from point where userid = #{userid}
select count(cpnno) as cpnno from coupon where userid = #{userid}
select count(reviewno) as reviewno from review where userid = #{userid}
select count(qnano) as qnano from qna where userid = #{userid}

select * from (select * from (select qnano, userid, qnacate, qnasubject, qnacontent, orderno, qnaorgno, qnastep, qnaprint, answercontent, to_char(qnadate, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') as qnadate from qna where userid=#{userid} order by qnano desc) where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{onePageNum} order by qnano asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord}#{onePageRecord} order by qnano desc
select count(qnano) as totalRecord from qna where userid = #{userid} and ${qnaSearchKey} like '%${qnaSearchWord}%'

select * from (select * from (select cpnno, userid, cpnname, apply, available, salerate, cpnstart, cpnend from coupon where userid=#{userid} order by cpnno desc) where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{onePageNum} order by cpnno asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord}#{onePageRecord} order by cpnno desc
select count(cpnno) as totalRecord from coupon where userid = #{userid}

select * from (select * from (select pointdate, pointcontent, point, userid from point where userid=#{userid} order by rownum desc) where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{onePageNum} order by rownum asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord}#{onePageRecord} order by rownum desc
select count(rownum) as totalRecord from point where userid = #{userid}

select * from (select * from (select reviewno, pno, userid, grade, reviewcontent, reviewdate from review where userid=#{userid} order by reviewno desc) where rownum<=#{pageNum} * #{onePageNum} order by reviewno asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord}#{onePageRecord} order by reviewno desc
select count(reviewno) as totalRecord from review where userid = #{userid}
